DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I’ve come to give you your final task.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I could come up with more, but I don’t have much time.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: You must create a legendary artifact — the Heart of Creation.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: It has no purpose, but that doesn’t matter.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: What matters is that if you don’t create it within two days, you will leave this world.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Otherwise, I’ll let you live here as long as your heart desires.
